meanings.definition: Consisting of or pertaining to allegory.
meanings.sent1: The book had an allegoric story that taught a lesson through symbols.
meanings.sent2: The allegoric tale was filled with hidden meanings waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent3: The allegoric play made the audience think about life in a different way.
meanings.sent4: Her allegoric paintings spoke volumes without using words.
meanings.sent5: The allegoric imagery in the movie stayed with me long after it ended.
